sentence.Network_en: Hundreds of interviews were recorded in longhand, typed up in single spacing and arranged in piles.
sentence.Network_cn: 他手写记录了数百份访谈,以单行距打字录入, 并摞起来放好.

sentence.Network_en: These days work plays an important part in a single woman's life.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在，工作在单身女性的生活中起着重要作用。

sentence.Network_en: The price of a single ticket is thirty-nine pounds.
